Module comp3111.examsystem

Package comp3111.examsystem.model

package comp3111.examsystem.model
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    comp3111.examsystem
     
    comp3111.examsystem.controller
     
  • Class
    Description
    Course
    Represents a course in the exam system.
    CourseDb
    A database management system for Course objects.
    DataCollection
    A container class that holds all database objects for the exam system.
    DataSerializer
    Utility class for serializing and deserializing objects related to the exam system.
    DataStorage
    Handles the persistence of application data to and from disk storage.
    Exam
    Represents an exam in the system, containing information about its ID, name, duration, associated course, publication status, and questions.
    ExamDb
    Represents a database management system for exams in an examination system.
    Gender
    Self-explanatory
    Grade
    Represents a grade earned by a student on an exam.
    GradeDb
    A database management class for storing and retrieving student exam grades.
    Manager
    Represents a manager in the exam system, with a username and password.
    ManagerDb
    A database class that manages a collection of Manager objects and handles manager authentication.
    Question
    Represents a question in the exam system, including its ID, title, multiple choice options, correct answer, and point value.
    QuestionDb
    A database management system for exam questions.
    Student
    The `Student` class represents a student in the exam system.
    StudentDb
    A database for managing student records in the exam system.
    Teacher
    Represents a teacher in the system, containing information about their ID, username, password, name, age, department, and position.
    TeacherDb
    A database for managing teacher records.
    Type
